name: precommit
description: Yet another precommit module that will run tasks defined in a config file or in a `package.json` file, stashing anything that is not supposed to be commited before run the scripts to avoid false positives when running validation like tasks

scripts.watch: npm run cover && watch-spawn -p 'specs/**/*.js' -p 'lib/**/*.js' -p 'hook/**/*.js' -p 'bin/**/*.js' npm run cover
scripts.check: npm run beautify-check && npm run eslint
scripts.lint: npm run beautify && npm run eslint
scripts.do-changelog: npm run changelog && git add ./changelog.md && git commit -m 'DOC: Generate changelog'
scripts.post-v: npm run do-changelog && git push --no-verify && git push --tags --no-verify
scripts.bump-major: npm run pre-v && npm version major -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-v && npm version minor -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-v && npm version patch -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v

author: Roy Riojas (http://royriojas.com)
